creator: hauser@acm.org
text:
and better even where to obtain it.

see also: http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=15626

This seems pretty much identical to bug 15625.

creator: slive@apache.org
slive@apache.org
text:
I see you are refering to a particular URL.  But it is easier for us
if we group small related changes like this into one bug.

fine, in the future I will group URLs, but I hope it is ok, to draw your
attention to forgotten URLs if that were ever to happen.
creator: hauser@acm.org

text: Sure.  Your suggestions are very welcome.
creator: slive@apache.org
